What is Ye?

This collection consists of three iconic silhouettes from the Ye archives, that were deconstructed and rebuilt in Kanye’s creative vision.“3” AKA "The Three" released in 2017 and was one of the fastest and most ambitious design Kanye has ever produced, taking about three months from ideation to release.

Our shop
